name: Tecton Inc.
description:
Want to get rich FAST?  Join Tecton Inc

a Space-R Corp. join (ad)venture!

What is better than finding ore underground? Well, finding it on the surface!

Tecton Inc. specializes in extracting minerals from unstable planets where tectonic plates shift continuously. Constant earthquakes push minerals outwards for you to grab and become rich! Put them in the dropship, you'll see your account balance rising as bubbles on champagne!*

Dangerous, you say? Not much more than having a walk on the beach!**

Not sure about unstable tectonic plates? Don't worry! There is plenty of jobs at Space-R Corp. Would you prefer becoming a mech miner at Titan instead?

---

*after paying travel, accomodation, tools and fuel expenses. 
 **actually much more dangerous than having a walk on the beach.

---

A game made in a weekend for Ludum Dare game jam (compo)
Theme: "every 10 seconds"
You can rate this entry here! Please do it and share your thoughts!
